report.title: Occurrence added of species in list
report.description: Alert on addition of a record of a species in a given list. Simple query for performance so does not perform a hierarchical taxon query or work across taxon lists.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences_functional o join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.taxon_meaning_id=o.taxon_meaning_id join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id=#scratchpad_list_id# join index_websites_website_agreements iwwa on iwwa.from_website_id=o.website_id and iwwa.to_website_id=#website_id# and iwwa.provide_for_#sharing#=true left join determinations d on d.occurrence_id=o.id and d.deleted=false and d.updated_on>'#date#' where o.updated_on>'#date#' -- new record, or just redetermined. and (o.created_on>'#date#' or d.id is not null) and o.confidential=false

param.name: website_id
param.description: ID of website to load occurrences for

param.name: sharing
param.description: Mode for including records from other websites
